title: JPSC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 30 Drug Inspector Posts
description: The Jharkhand Public Service Commission (JPSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 30 Drug Inspector Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B. Pharm, MBBS can apply for the JPSC Notification 2026 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fe...
